mapper.select: select l.OPENNUM,l.lnum,l.DIVIDENUM,l.LYEAR,l.TERM, li.GRADE, li.lname, l.BOOK,find_code_name(100,li.dcode) as division, l.NEWLIMITCOUNT, lr.LRNAME, l.TIMETABLE, l.DATESTATUS from lecture l, lecture_info li, LECTURE_ROOM lr where l.lnum = li.lnum and l.LRCODE = lr.LRCODE and l.pid=#{pid} order by 1

select i.sid, i.sname, i.email,i.grade,i.disabled, i.sphone, l.lnum, l.opennum, f.lname, p.pid from students i, lecture l, lecture_info f,professor p,SCORE_MANA s where l.lnum = f.lnum and p.pid = l.pid and l.opennum = s.opennum and p.pid = #{pid} and s.OPENNUM = #{opennum}

select l.OPENNUM,l.lnum,l.DIVIDENUM,l.LYEAR,l.TERM, li.GRADE, li.lname, l.BOOK,find_code_name(100,li.dcode) as division, l.NEWLIMITCOUNT, lr.LRNAME, l.TIMETABLE, l.DATESTATUS from lecture l, lecture_info li, LECTURE_ROOM lr where l.lnum = li.lnum and l.LRCODE = lr.LRCODE and l.pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: update SCORE_MANA set middlescore = #{middlescore}, finalscore = #{finalscore}, homework = #{homework}, attendancescore = #{attendancescore}, total = #{total}, rank = #{rank} where opennum = #{opennum}
